Sentencas: Reduction kinetics of NiO-gadolinium-doped ceria (GDC) composites was studied.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites

Sentencas: NiO-GDC ceramic rods were fabricated by cold isostatic pressing of powders of nanometer size obtained by chemical synthesis.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites

Sentencas: The rods were sintered in air at the maximum contraction temperature, 1350 degrees C. and treated in reducing atmosphere at different temperatures and reduction times.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites

Sentencas: Progress of the reduction process was followed by the gravimetric method.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites

Sentencas: By adjusting the data obtained from weight loss during the isothermal reduction at temperatures between 500 and 700 degrees C to standard diffusion models for a cylinder, it was possible to obtain effective diffusion coefficients for the material.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites

Sentencas: The process activation energy was 0.9 +/- 0.2 eV indicating that, in the whole temperature range studied, the reduction kinetics is controlled by the diffusion of O2- throughout the ceramic matrix of GDC.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites

Sentencas: SEM studies in reduced, partially reduced and completely reduced samples reveal a submicrometric microstructure with a uniform distribution of Ni phase surrounded by pores within ceramic GDC matrix.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites

Sentencas: This microstructure is suitable for IT-SOFC anodes.
Titulo: Redox behaviour of Gd-doped ceria-nickel oxide composites
